documentation.title: Comma After Last Array Item
documentation.standard: For single-line arrays, there should be no comma after the last array item. However, for multi-line arrays, there should be a comma after the last array item.

code.title: Valid: Single-line array without a comma after the last item
Invalid: Single-line array with a comma after the last item
Valid: Multi-line array with a comma after the last item
Invalid: Multi-line array without a comma after the last item
